languages.text: "Проведите тщательное расследование. Нужно понять, как погибли невольники, и установить виновных".
"Conduct a thorough investigation. We must understand the prisoners' cause of death and track down the culprits."
languages.original_text: "Проведите тщательное расследование. Нужно понять, как погибли невольники, и установить виновных".

traits.locale_text: "Conduct a thorough investigation. We have to understand the slaves' cause of death and find the culprits."
"Conduct a thorough investigation. We have to understand the slaves' cause of death and find the culprits."
"Conduct a thorough investigation. We must understand the prisoners' cause of death and track down the culprits."
"Conduct a thorough investigation. We have to understand the slaves' cause of death and track down the culprits."
"Conduct a thorough investigation. We have to understand the prisoners' cause of death and track down the culprits."
"Conduct a thorough investigation. We must understand the prisoners' cause of death and track down the culprits."
"Conduct a thorough investigation. We must understand the prisoners' cause of death and track down the culprits."
"Conduct a thorough investigation. We must understand the prisoners' cause of death and track down the culprits."

languages.text: “进行彻底调查。我们必须了解那些囚犯的死因，追查到罪魁祸首。”
languages.original_text: "Conduct a thorough investigation. We must understand the prisoners' cause of death and track down the culprits."

traits.locale_text: “进行彻底调查。我们必须了解那些囚犯的死因，追查到罪魁祸首。”
“进行彻底调查。我们必须了解那些囚犯的死因，追查到罪魁祸首。”

languages.text: «Lleve a cabo una investigación exhaustiva. Debemos entender la causa de muerte de los prisioneros y localizar a los culpables».
languages.original_text: "Conduct a thorough investigation. We must understand the prisoners' cause of death and track down the culprits."

traits.locale_text: «Lleve a cabo una investigación exhaustiva. Debemos entender la causa de muerte de los prisioneros y localizar a los culpables».

languages.text: 「徹底的な調査を実施せよ。囚人たちの死因を解明し、犯人を突き止めなければならない」
languages.original_text: "Conduct a thorough investigation. We must understand the prisoners' cause of death and track down the culprits."

traits.locale_text: 「徹底的な調査を実施せよ。奴隷たちの死因を解明し、犯人を突き止めなければならない」
「徹底的な調査を実施せよ。奴隷たちの死因を解明し、犯人を突き止めなければならない」

languages.text: « Menez une enquête minutieuse. Nous devons découvrir ce qui a provoqué la mort de ces détenus et retrouver les coupables. »
languages.original_text: "Conduct a thorough investigation. We must understand the prisoners' cause of death and track down the culprits."

traits.locale_text: « Menez une enquête minutieuse. Nous devons découvrir ce qui a provoqué la mort de ces détenus et retrouver les coupables. »

languages.text: "Führt eine gründliche Untersuchung durch. Wir müssen wissen, woran die Arbeiter gestorben sind, und die Schuldigen aufspüren."
languages.original_text: "Conduct a thorough investigation. We must understand the prisoners' cause of death and track down the culprits."

traits.locale_text: "Führt eine gründliche Untersuchung durch. Wir müssen wissen, woran die Arbeiter gestorben sind, und die Schuldigen aufspüren."
"Führt eine gründliche Untersuchung durch. Wir müssen verstehen, woran die Sklaven gestorben sind, und die Täter aufspüren."

languages.text: "Detaylı bir soruşturma yürütülsün. Mahkûmların ölüm sebeplerini öğrenip failleri yakalamamız gerekir."
languages.original_text: "Conduct a thorough investigation. We must understand the prisoners' cause of death and track down the culprits."
